stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Dr. Druken is heavy on group work which comes off as a pain but ends up being very helpful. You have two major group projects which are simple enough to complete. I\'m not great at math and she helped me through any problems I was having. She\'s a kind person and I really enjoyed her class.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Dr. Druken really loves her students and gives many chances to go to office hours and get to know her. I hated math before her, but now I have a new found respect for it. If given the opportunity, TAKE HER. 2 midterms, 1 final, and an easy group project. I found it very manageable. You will have weekly homework as well, which was the hardest part.

comments: Try not to take math 303A with her if youre not good at math, she\'s pretty hard. She assigns so much work and it\'s not even in the textbook, she complicates every lesson when it doesn\'t need to be and she gives confusing directions.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I loved Bridget! She was super fun and a great teacher. She made everything really clear and had cool activities for us to do. If you\'re a Liberal Studies major, this is a very helpful class. If you\'re not, I knew people in other majors that took this class for fun.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Best math teacher ever! People who are taking this class want to be teachers- you should have to know this material inside and out. She will help you in any way that she can. She is clear and enthusiastic. She wants you to do well, and I totally recommend that you take her class!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: nice but VERY unclear. will assign homework from book and u will get it wrong even if you follow the directions in the book. she will not tell u how she want it done, unless u ask. VERY VERY unclear and tideous. so u have to be tideous and specific with everything including your homework, test answers, and questions.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Bridget is so sweet and helpful the whole semester and she really works hard to make sure everybody in the class completely understands what\'s going on. The class itself is not extremely challenging but having Bridget as a professor made the class so much more enjoyable.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Take math with Bridget! She is helpful, and knows what she is talking about. If you want to pass the LS exam then you should take her! There are quizzes and 2 midterms and final. Make sure you do the HW ahead of time, and go to her office hours!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Do not listen to those beginning people! It is a math class, of course there is going to be a lot of homework. Bridget is an awesome teacher and she is extremely nice. She is really good at explaining things in different ways so everyone can understand. She loves when people ask questions and will adjust her schedule if you bring it up. Take her!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Take her class! She is super nice and a great teacher. She helps students out when they need it and is very good at explaining things multiple ways so students can understand. She is willing to adjust too if you ask. Ignore those posts where kids complain about too much homework; it\'s a math class, what do you expect?

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: DO NOT LISTEN TO THESE OTHER COMMENTS! She is a really great professor! Always willing to help and is super friendly! I learned so much from her! Yeah there is a lot of homework, but it is not that bad, and it is not too difficult! I HIGHLY recommend her! TAKE HER! :)

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: DO NOT LET THESE PEOPLE SCARE YOU!! this class is actually pretty EASY!! yea there is a bit of work but it will help you in the end. Do the HW assigned and you will do good on the chapter quizes. The midterm and final were pretty okay just keep your stuff to review later. She\'s nice and helps during office hours. I got an A!!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: i cant beleive how bad her ratings are! she was such a great professor. one of the easiest classes ive ever taken. she is super friendly and helps explain to people who dont understand. the class is amazingly easy though. the hw is tedious but its assigned far before its due so just get it over with and youre done. great class. definately take her!

comments: This class is way easy. The last chapter before the final is dividing w/ fractions. just do the learning exercises and journals. and raise your hand, she\'s typically dying in front of the class, praying someone will raise their hand.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: It\'s really insane how delusional this teacher is. She assigns so much homework and pointless assignments, and then grades everything (even hw) so hard. Quizzes and tests are ridiculously difficult and with the amount of work she assigns it should be a 5 unit class. Be prepared to spend HOURS on this class!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Do NOT take this professor unless you want to spend hours and hours of your time on homework. She assigns a ridiculous amount of "learning exercises," journals (I thought this was Math), and even a "Reflection Paper" (see last comment), in addition to midterms and quizzes. She\'s nice, but the amount of work and required participation is insane!
